enb_long_title: Second Conference of the Parties to the Framework Convention on Climate Change
sentences: Sukio Iwadare, Minister of State, Director General of the Environment Agency, urged the COP to shift its emphasis from analysis and assessment to negotiation by consolidating the points and proposals.

He called for the formulation of a legal instrument that reflects: precautionary measures; environmental effectiveness; equitable and efficient distribution of policy efforts; positive direction; creation of a foundation for global measures; and the active development and transfer of clean technologies.
